guide: Carrots and potatoes from killing
Zombies in graveyard do count.
Kill Endermen in The End using full Ender Armor
and a Void Sword or Dreadlord Sword.

note: Gain coins from the Scavenger Enchant
guide: Apply/Use the highest tier of Scavenger
that you can get your hands on and put it
on your main weapon. Gifts from the Jerry Island
can be a way to obtain Scavenger IV books.
You can also use the weapon drops from dungeon mobs
as those have guaranteed Scavenger 5.
You can get easy contribution for
this by breaking some Wheat in the Hub.
If you want faster contribution,
make a Sugar Cane farm in your Garden
which will also be needed for another goal.
For this you need Combat 15 and you'll
likely want friends or other players
to help you with it.
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes
on xMeru's, skyerzz's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
Talk to Guildford in the Dungeon Hub
and complete 4/4 objectives for 3 races.
Don't forget to talk to Guildford
after each run you do.
The easiest solution for this is the Jerry pet.
For this you only need 8 Move Jerry and an Egg.
Those drop with a 20% chance from the chicken
in The Barn.
For this you'll want to do
Mining Commissions in the Dwarven Mines
aswell as the Commission Milestones.
You can unlock 17/17 Farming Collections,
6/11 Combat Collections, 6/6 Foraging Collections,
14/22 Mining Collections for a total of 43 collections.
You will also get some Fishing Collections.
For this you'll want to do
Mining Commissions in the Dwarven Mines
and make use of HotM perks like
Mining Speed/Spread and Pickobulus.
Complete a Floor 1 with a score of 230+
and buy the chest afterwards. If you can't buy
it on the spot, either save money and buy it
from Croesus within the next 2 days or do another run.
You will probably need help with this.
Fish in the Hub until you can enter the Backwater Bayou.
Fish there and lootshare mobs until you unlock
Fishing Minions. Place as many of them on your island,
as you can and give them the best fuel and storage
you have access to and don't forget to collect in time.
Do commissions and events in The Dwarven Mines,
claim your daily powder from the Puzzler and
from giving Fetchur the items he asks for.
Fetchurs items are all listed in the Wiki.
Try to do those while a '2x Powder' event is active.
You might want to use the Royal Reforge on your
equipment to gain more powder from events.
You can also fish up and kill Mithril Grubbers
in the Abandoned Quarry (Fishing 6).
This unlocks at 2.5k Raw Porkchop Collection
and requires 40 Enchanted Pork to make.
You can use Minions for this.
For this you'll need at least 1 Arachnes Calling
which drop from Arachnes Keepers. Place them together
with others in the altar at /warp arachne.
You can summon it alone with 4 Callings.
Buy a Dirt Bottle (100k) from
the Smithmonger in the Hub
and reforge an uncommon+ rarity weapon with it.
Kill goblins or open loot chests in the Crystal Hollows,
then just throw them until you get a Golden Goblin.
Higher level eggs have higher chances of spawning,
but are also rarer to get.
You'll most likely get this from
leveling up skills during this Bingo.
Remember to actually put the money
you get in the Bank :)
For this you can either do:
- 1 t1, t2 and 2 t3 or
- 1 t1 and 8 t2
and claim the rewards by talking to Maddox.

note: Obtain a Mediocre Ring of Love
guide: Follow the Romero Questline until you
get this. You will only need
1 Yellow Rock, 15 poppies and 64 Emerald.
Start an Entrance floor and play Mage/Tank/Berserker to use
the classes abilities to kill a Lost Adventurer.
You only need to get the last hit
on it to count, so you can get help from your team.
You need Combat Level 15 to join a Dungeon.
Use the best rod you can in the Backwater Bayou
and use the Angler Set bought from the Fish Merchant
in the Hub. Also use the best bait you have access to.
Wear Ender Armor enchanted with Growth 5
and wear it in The End.
You can also enchant Mushroom Armor like that
and wear it in The Garden.
Growth 5 requires Enchanting Level 5
and costs 50 Experience Levels per piece.
Reforge your armor to Titanic if needed.
For this you should utilize the Garden.
Sugar Cane will unlock at Garden Level 5.
Use the Basic or Advanced Gardening Hoe,
enchant it with Harvesting 5,
and get a Common Chicken Pet.
You can also utilize pests to help with it.
